items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOOOOOOOVE it.
items.body: The media could not be loaded. FIRE. love love love. wore for my 32 birthday dinner for a very simple sultry look and it was a HIT! fit so comfortably and no dig into the shoulders despite the thin straps. I'm tall (about 5'10.5, so maybe 6' or so in this shot) and full figured (like 300) so this was both lengthy and extremely flattering. No tightness or discomfort, great stretch, and the ruffles covered some of my problem areas. The material was thick but not too dense so i was comfy in summery weather and there was no sheerness. Cannot stress enough how much i loved this. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Formal Wedding
items.body: This dress was amazing... looked and fit great and the price was budget friendly. Dress did not feel cheap and hugged my curves..perfect length that my high shoes were visible and then my flats did not drag the floor .. i got so many compliments on how great i looked... 5'3. 137lbs , 34DD size M Read more
items.author: Patty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & elegant
items.body: This dress was made me feel so pretty and comfortable! The material is comfortable and thick, the ruffles detailed made it look so high end I felt amazing. Length was perfect and the way it fit in my body was lovely. Definitely recommend, itâ€™s true-fit so get your regular size. Read more
items.author: Ita rosales

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and form fitting but stretchy!
items.body: Although I returned it, I can say in my opinion the color, quality and fit are good. I just would have preferred it to be longer. I am 5'5 and 110lbs. It hit above my ankle bones. I prefer my maxi dresses to hit below my ankle bones, even a bit longer. Read more
items.author: KH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super elegant and comfortable!
items.body: I absolutely love this HOCILLE Womenâ€™s V Neck Backless Bodycon dress. The fit is perfect and really flatters your figure â€” it makes your body look amazing! The material feels soft and comfortable, while the style is elegant enough for any special occasion. True size. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy dress!
items.body: I bought this dress for a wedding. It was a little too sexy for the occasion so I'm keeping it for another time. It fits like a glove. I'm 5'7 and weigh 205. The dress is nicely made and hugs in all the right places. I would recommend if you want a sultry, sexy look. ðŸ˜‰ Read more
items.author: Katie Elizabeth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress for all-white party
items.body: Absolutely gorgeous dress, I wore it for an all white party and I received so many compliments. It is also very comfortable and stretchy. It is not too sheer and I had no issues with people being able to see through it. Read more
items.author: Alix H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Dress for Every Event!
items.body: Quite honestly the most comfortable dress ever. Bought it for a cruise and its the perfect material very stretchy and not see through at all. I have every color in my cart for future events, this will be my go to dress. For reference I am 5'3" - 130 pounds and 34DD and ordered a Small and its a perfect length (stops right at my ankles so no tripping) and fit to feel sexy and confident in! Read more
items.author: Panasonic Close Curves Electric Razor

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Maxi Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail V Neck Maxi Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Baby Blue, Wine Red, Pink, White, Purple, Yellow, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
